name: Sahara Desert [UE4]
description:
Sahara Desert is an early prototype of an adventure game built within Unreal Engine 4. 

The game is currently in an early testing stage and all versions of the game will be available to download at any time to allow players to view the progression of the game as more elements are developed. 

Currently there is no way of exiting the game, please use Alt+F4 for now. The player can also become stuck behind or on some objects in the scene, this will be investigated and improved for a future alpha build
